description: Bridge Axiom Templates for Ecological-Financial Translation

changelog.changes: BA-001: Corrected DOI (was pointing to wrong paper), updated coefficients with verified 2024 source

axioms.name: mpa_biomass_dive_tourism_value
axioms.description: Fish biomass increases in MPAs drive increased diver willingness-to-pay and tourism revenue
axioms.pattern: IF full_protection(Site) THEN biomass_increase(Site, 113%) AND wtp_increase(Site, 84%) AND revenue_contribution(biomass, 47%)

sources.citation: Marcos-Castillo S et al. 2024. Scientific Reports
sources.finding: Global bioeconomic model: divers willing to pay up to 84% more for biomass increases; 47% of economic improvements from biomass gains

sources.citation: Uyarra MC et al. 2009. Environmental Management
sources.finding: Divers select destinations based on marine life quality and quantity

caveats: Willingness-to-pay varies by diver experience and destination
Effect magnitude depends on baseline conditions
MPA name effect provides immediate value before biological recovery

example_calculation.interpretation: Full protection → 113% biomass increase → up to 84% higher WTP → 47% of total revenue improvement

axioms.methodology_note: Based on willingness-to-pay demand curve estimation, not simple linear elasticity

axioms.name: notake_mpa_biomass_multiplier
axioms.description: No-take MPAs accumulate fish biomass relative to unprotected areas
axioms.pattern: IF mpa_type(Site, 'no_take') AND enforced(Site, TRUE) AND age_years(Site, N) THEN biomass_ratio(Site, f(N))

sources.citation: Hopf JK et al. 2024. Ecological Applications
sources.finding: Global meta-analysis of no-take MPA effectiveness
NEOLI criteria determine MPA conservation outcomes

example_calculation.interpretation: 10-year-old enforced no-take reserve has 670% of unprotected biomass

axioms.name: sea_otter_kelp_carbon_cascade
axioms.description: Sea otter presence drives trophic cascade increasing kelp carbon storage
axioms.pattern: IF otter_presence(Site, TRUE) THEN carbon_storage_multiplier(Site, 12) AND carbon_value_usd(Site, V)

sources.citation: Wilmers CC et al. 2012. Frontiers in Ecology and the Environment
sources.finding: Sea otters increase kelp carbon storage worth $205-408M

context_dependency.reference: Selden et al. 2024 PNAS - muted cascade at San Nicolas Island

axioms.name: coral_reef_flood_protection
axioms.description: Coral reef structural integrity reduces coastal flood damages
axioms.pattern: IF reef_condition(Site, C) AND reef_area_km2(Site, A) THEN flood_protection_value_usd(Site, f(C, A))

sources.citation: Beck MW et al. 2018. Nature Communications
sources.finding: Coral reefs provide $272B/year in global flood protection

axioms.name: mangrove_flood_protection
axioms.description: Mangrove extent and width provide coastal flood protection
axioms.pattern: IF mangrove_area_ha(Site, A) THEN flood_protection_value_usd_yr(Site, A * V_ha)

sources.citation: Menendez P et al. 2020. Scientific Reports

axioms.name: mangrove_fisheries_production
axioms.description: Mangrove extent correlates with adjacent fisheries catches
axioms.pattern: IF mangrove_fringe_ha(Site, A) THEN fisheries_value_usd_yr(Site, A * V_ha)

sources.finding: Mangroves in Gulf of California increase fishery yields

sources.citation: Carrasquilla-Henao M et al. 2025. Comms Earth & Environ

axioms.name: mangrove_carbon_stock
axioms.description: Mangrove ecosystems store exceptional carbon per hectare
axioms.pattern: IF mangrove_condition(Site, C) THEN carbon_stock_mg_ha(Site, f(C))
axioms.comparison: 4x more carbon than most tropical forests

sources.citation: Donato DC et al. 2011. Nature Geoscience
sources.finding: Mangroves among most carbon-rich forests in tropics

sources.citation: Murdiyarso D et al. 2023. Carbon Balance Management
sources.finding: Indonesian mangrove emission factors by condition

axioms.name: seagrass_carbon_credit_value
axioms.description: Seagrass conservation and restoration generate carbon credit revenue
axioms.pattern: IF seagrass_project_type(Site, T) AND area_ha(Site, A) THEN carbon_revenue_usd_10yr(Site, f(T, A))

sources.citation: Duarte CM et al. 2025. npj Ocean Sustainability
sources.finding: Seagrass carbon credit revenue varies by management approach

sources.citation: Oreska MPJ et al. 2020. Scientific Reports
sources.finding: Net GHG offset from seagrass restoration

axioms.name: mangrove_restoration_bcr
axioms.description: Mangrove restoration yields positive benefit-cost ratios
axioms.pattern: IF restoration_investment_usd(Site, I) AND discount_rate(R) THEN bcr(Site, f(I, R))

sources.citation: Zeng Y et al. 2025. Nature Communications

axioms.name: kelp_forest_global_value
axioms.description: Kelp forests provide substantial ecosystem services globally
axioms.pattern: IF kelp_forest_area_ha(Site, A) THEN ecosystem_service_value_usd_yr(Site, A * V_ha)

sources.citation: Eger AM et al. 2023. Nature Communications
sources.finding: Global kelp forest ecosystem service valuation

axioms.name: mpa_climate_resilience
axioms.description: MPAs enhance ecosystem resilience to climate disturbances

sources.citation: Ortiz-Villa A et al. 2024. Global Change Biology
sources.finding: California MPAs show 8.5% kelp increase post-heatwave

sources.citation: Mellin C et al. 2016. Ecology Letters
sources.finding: MPAs increase coral reef community resilience

axioms.name: reef_degradation_fisheries_loss
axioms.description: Coral reef structural degradation reduces fisheries productivity

sources.citation: Rogers A et al. 2018. Journal of Applied Ecology
sources.finding: Reef degradation causes 35%+ fisheries productivity loss

usage_guidance.confidence_propagation: When chaining multiple axioms, multiply confidence intervals
usage_guidance.uncertainty_handling: Always report ranges, not point estimates
usage_guidance.source_verification: Cross-reference with source DOIs before using in financial context
